sentences.sContent: The name Sahara conjures up images of a desert of aridity .
sentences.sContent_eng: The name Sahara conjures up images of a desert of aridity .
sentences.sCn: “撒哈拉”这个名字使人想起干旱的沙漠情景。

sentences.sContent: Because of regional underground water level continual dropping and climate changing to aridity , land desertifacation and degeneration of glassland and tundra will tend to worse in short period.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of regional underground water level continual dropping and climate changing to aridity , land desertifacation and degeneration of glassland and tundra will tend to worse in short period.
sentences.sCn: 由于区域地下水位的持续下降和气候向干旱化发展，土地沙化、草场退化及多年冻土退化短期内将趋于恶化。

words.tran: 干旱的；不毛的，[农] 荒芜的
